🐾 Light Bud is a browser pet that lives on your productivity! It makes staying on task fun and absolutely adorable.
👀 Stay focused, because every distraction ticks away at your Bud's health.
⌛The focus timer feature puts Light Bud to sleep and blocks all distractions completely!

💫 Roadmap (Coming Soon):
- UI update
- statistics
